Featured.Title: The Irishman
Featured.Description: An aging hitman reflects on his past involvement with the mob and the disappearance of his friend Jimmy Hoffa in this epic crime drama directed by Martin Scorsese.

TendingNow.Title: San Andreas
TendingNow.Description: After a massive earthquake hits California, a rescue-chopper pilot embarks on a dangerous mission to save his daughter amidst widespread destruction.

TendingNow.Title: good Doctor
TendingNow.Description: A young autistic surgeon with savant syndrome joins a prestigious hospital’s surgical unit, where he must prove himself to skeptical colleagues.

TendingNow.Title: Red Notice
TendingNow.Description: An FBI profiler reluctantly teams up with a notorious art thief to catch an even more elusive criminal in this action-packed comedy thriller.
